personalInfo.education: University of North Texas (Applied Arts and Sciences, 2008)

tourBios.exmtStatus: Exempt - Finished 11-45 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament (exempt to second reshuffle)
tourBios.carHigh: 2015: Played in nine events on the Adams Pro Golf Tour, made five cuts and recorded three top-25s.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won 17 tournaments in four years at Monsignor Kelly Catholic High School and was a four-time district champion...While attending the University of North Texas earned his first collegiate win, at the 2005 Rice Intercollegiate...Was named to the All-Sun Belt Conference team as a senior.
tourBios.personal: Biggest thrill in golf was winning the Texas State Open in 2014...Favorite sporting events attended were the 2006 NBA Finals and the 2011 American League Conference Series...Favorite quote is "Obstacles are the things you see when you take your eyes off your goals."...Favorite sports teams are the Dallas Cowboys, Houston Rockets and Houston Astros...His dream foursome includes Jesus, Buddha and Krishna...Favorite artists includes Justin Timberlake, John Mayer, Zac Brown Band and Steely Dan...Earliest golf memory was the first tournament he played in Beaumont...Would be a golf teacher or real estate investor if he weren't playing golf.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T50th in 2011 at the Stadion Classic at UGA.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 72nd in Driving Distance on the Web.com Tour.
